sentences.sContent: With a pool and patio outside and a working fireplace and spiral staircases inside, the seven-bedroom house should have buyers lining up.
sentences.sContent_eng: With a pool and patio outside and a working fireplace and spiral staircases inside, the seven-bedroom house should have buyers lining up.
sentences.sCn: 外面有游泳池和院子，里面有壁炉和旋转楼梯，这个拥有七间卧室的房子本来应该有很多买家的。
